com.majeur.preferencekit

Class RadioPreferenceGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • PreferenceGroup
      • com.majeur.preferencekit.RadioPreferenceGroup

  • public class RadioPreferenceGroup
extends PreferenceGroup
    Preference group that holds a list of linked radio preferences. It is the same purpose as a android.widget.RadioGroup widget. Persisted value is the index of selected radio button. RadioTitles must be set through xml or code, summaries and icons are optional.
